issue.description:
Intro says: "Justification represent the identification and description of the reasons why an activity may be required." However activity is not the only thing that could be subject of justification. Suggest change to: "Justification represent the identification and description of the reasons for something. Justifications may be associated with the data to which they apply.
For example: a justification may be provided for a product design. Similarly, a justification may be provided for why an activity is needed or was undertaken."
The select classification_item should contain: Justification_assignment Justification_support_assignment Justification

comment.description: Classification of justification will be done in ap239_part_definition_information
